Package validation

package validation
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractInputValidator<T>
    Abstract class that extends AbstractValidator and defines type-specific validation methods for input.
    AbstractMenuItemValidator
    Abstract class that defines common methods for validating menu items.
    AbstractOrderValidator
    Abstract class that defines type-specific validation methods for orders.
    AbstractValidator<T>
    Abstract class that defines common methods for validating input.
    ConsoleInputHandler<T>
    The ConsoleInputHandler class handles console input and validates it using the provided InputValidator with improved resource management and timeout handling.
